Source code for horizonms.engine.base


[docs]
class CheckpointMetric():
    def __init__(self, name, mode):
        assert mode in ['min', 'max', 'all'], "mode has to be in 'min', 'max' or 'all'"
        self.name = name
        self.mode = mode
        if mode == 'min':
            self.value = 10000
        elif mode == 'max':
            self.value = -10000
        else:
            self.value = None
            self.name = 'save_all'       



[docs]
    def value_update(self, value):
        self.value = value
